GuitarChords.Title: Guitar Chords
GuitarChords.Presentation: This is a quick tool for musicians, especially guitarist. It allows you to see which notes are part of a chord, and where they are.
GuitarChords.Code1: First, I need to declare a few constants to describe notes. I have an array containing all notes and alterations, an array containing "white keys" and another for "black keys". I define some colors for my notes, and finally an enum for the    different modes.
